A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I cannot believe what I'm seeing.
TLJ is without a doubt one of the best movies in the Star Wars saga. As a huge Star Wars fan\, I came to my country's premiere\, when I left the movie theater I was sure that this movie will be loved by the community.

This movie is absolutely fantastic. Both plots were interesting and very enjoyable.

To those who are saying that they are disappointed of the truth about Rey's parents- This is exactly what I hoped and thought will happen. Making her the daughter/cousin/nephew of someone would be really\, really Cliché.
